page.title: 18Craigtoun Park, St. Andrews
page.content: {Craigtoun Country Park,}situated two miles from the town of St. Andrews, is the major park in the district.It covers approximately fifty acres.It was established in 1947 at a cost of Â£25 000. The park has a miniature railway, crazy golf,trampolines, a boating pond, a bowling green, a putting green and some ride-o-matics. There are also glass houses full of shrubs and flowering plants. Admission prices are as follows:_ Children under two.... free Children from two to five years and O.A.P. ................ 40p All other children and adults...Â£1. A Country Fair is held annually in the park, usually in the month of May.
